snippet: The Giants scored seven runs in the seventh inning after a video review led umpires to overturn an out call at home, and San Francisco beat the White Sox, 7-1.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; San Francisco Giants defeat Chicago White Sox, 7-1; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Giants scored seven runs in the seventh inning after a video review led umpires to overturn an out call at home, and San Francisco beat the White Sox, 7-1.
